law_name: THE ESTABLISHMENT OF THE FEDERAL BANK FOR COOPERATIVES AND REGULATION OF COOPERATIVE BANKING ACT

sections.body: This Act may be called the Establishment of the Federal Bank for Cooperatives and Regulation of Cooperative Banking Act, 1977. It extends to the whole of Pakistan and also applies to the business of the Bank transacted outside Pakistan and to persons conducting such business. It shall come into force at once and shall be deemed to have taken effect on the 9th day of October, 1976.

In this Act, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or context, various definitions are provided including 'approved securities', 'Bank', 'Board', 'Chairman', 'cooperative bank', 'cooperative society', 'borrower', 'demand liabilities', 'Director', 'District judge', 'family members', 'loans advances and credit', 'Managing Director', 'multi-unit cooperative society', 'prescribed', 'Provincial Cooperative Bank', 'regulation', 'rule', 'scheduled bank', and 'State Bank'.

This Act shall have effect notwithstanding anything contained in the Banks (Nationalization) Act, 1974, or any other law, excepting the State Bank of Pakistan Act, 1956, and the Banking Companies Ordinance, 1962.

sections.section_title: Power to exempt, and suspend operation of Act, in certain cases
sections.body: The Federal Government may, by notification in the official Gazette, exempt the Bank from, or suspend the application to the Bank of, all or any of the provisions of this Act.
The Federal Government shall take steps to establish a bank to be called 'The Federal Bank for Cooperatives' to carry out the purposes of this Act.
The initial share capital of the Bank shall be twenty crores of rupees divided into two thousand fully paid up shares of the nominal value of one hundred thousand rupees each.
The head office of the Bank shall be at Islamabad. The Bank shall establish one Regional Office in each Province.
The general direction and superintendence of the affairs and business of the Bank shall vest in a Board of Directors.
The Board shall consist of the Chairman and other members as specified.
The Managing Director shall be appointed by the Board.

sections.section_title: Disqualifications of Managing Director and Directors
sections.body: Certain disqualifications are outlined for the Managing Director and Directors.
Provisions regarding the meetings of the Board are specified.
Fees for attending meetings of the Board are to be determined.
Directors shall be indemnified under specified conditions.
An Advisory Committee may be constituted.
Provisions regarding the officers and servants of the Bank are specified.
The business and functions of the Bank are outlined.
Certain businesses are prohibited for the Bank.
The borrowing powers of the Bank are specified.
The Bank has the power to impose conditions.

sections.section_title: Power to call for payment before agreed period
sections.body: The Bank may call for payment before the agreed period.

sections.section_title: Special provision for enforcement of claims by the bank
sections.body: Special provisions for enforcement of claims by the Bank are outlined.
Provisions for the recovery of dues are specified.

sections.section_title: General lien and preferential treatment to the dues of the Bank
sections.body: General lien and preferential treatment for the Bank's dues are specified.
The Bank has the power to inspect.

sections.section_title: Power to prohibit acceptance of deposits
sections.body: The Bank may prohibit the acceptance of deposits.

sections.section_title: Power to call meeting and depute observers, etc.
sections.body: The Bank has the power to call meetings and depute observers.

sections.section_title: Power of the Bank to lay down policy guidelines and give directives in regard to business
sections.body: The Bank may lay down policy guidelines and give directives.
Provisions for the maintenance of liquid assets are specified.

sections.section_title: Power of the Bank to call for statements, returns, etc, and to publish information

sections.section_title: Duty of the officers and servants to maintain secrecy
sections.body: Officers and servants have a duty to maintain secrecy.
Provisions for the delegation of powers are specified.

sections.section_title: Prohibition against production and giving of evidence from unpublished record
sections.body: Prohibition against production of unpublished records is specified.
Provisions regarding reserves are specified.
Provisions for the disposal of profits are specified.
Provisions regarding accounts and audit are specified.

sections.section_title: Exemption from compulsory registration of certain instruments of the Bank
sections.body: The Bank is exempted from compulsory registration.
Provisions for the liquidation of the Bank are specified.

Provisions regarding the bar of investigation are specified.

Provisions regarding indemnity are specified.

sections.section_title: Provisions of certain sections to override the provisions
sections.body: Certain provisions are specified to override other provisions.

Provisions regarding the continuance of charge and priority are specified.

sections.section_title: Amendment of ordinance No LVII of 1962
sections.body: Provisions for the amendment of the ordinance are specified.
Provisions for the amendment of the Act are specified.
The Bank has the power to make rules.
The Bank has the power to make regulations.
Provisions for the removal of difficulties are specified.

sections.section_title: Exemption from certain civil and criminal liabilities
sections.body: The Bank is exempted from certain civil and criminal liabilities.
Provisions for the repeal of previous laws are specified.
